boardgame.name: Star Fleet Battles
boardgame.description: Initial publication of the games in the Star Fleet Battles series. This was one of the first Task Force Games Pocket Games. It was re-implemented and expanded several times after the original _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Pocket Game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This is the classic game of tactical Starship combat set in the Star Trek universe (the original TV show), though you will never see _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Star Trek_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; anywhere in the game (licensing limitation). Players command one or more ships from the Federation, Klingon, Gorn, Romulan, or Kzinti fleets, sporting all of the expected Star Trek weaponry like phasers, disruptor bolts, photon and plasma torpedoes, and tractor beams. Also includes other weaponry not commonly seen such as drones (homing missiles)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players allocate energy and plot movement before each turn, then move all of the ships simultaneously. Weapons are fired at will during the turn (i.e., not plotted before-hand like movement). Ships have shields and armor for protection. When these are breached, various ship systems are damaged, potentially crippling the combat capability of the ship, and eventually resulting in ship destruction._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game comes with various scenarios for players to reenact battles from the TV series, or provide for solo play._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implemented by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Star Fleet Battles (Designer's Edition)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Star Fleet Battles (Commander's Edition)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Star Fleet Battles Captain's Edition (Current Edition)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet

listing.notes: Played a few times. In very good condition.

This is the Star Fleet Battle_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Captain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition Basic Set, along with the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Advanced Missions_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; set. Lots of counters still unpunched. If you are interested, send me a message and I can get you a complete listing of what_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s inside. Both boxes have been ensconced in clear packing tape, so you may have to live with that...That_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s what gives it a good condition. Contents look very lightly played and in excellent condition. Also, as I have no idea of the value, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m putting it up with a pretty high price. If it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s way out of line, feel free to make an offer.

Punched. Excellent condition except two corners of box lid are split - one all the way and 1 inch for the other. Both are easily repaired. Also included Expansion #1, #2, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; #3 - all in great condition. Conter sheet for expansion #3 is unpunched.
Box has lots of wear but is intact,counters are unpunched.

Captain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition--Basic Set. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s identical to the one shown in BGG photo here: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/image/12448 Never played. I bought this when I was starting to get into D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;D but could never get any of my Uber-hyper friends to sit down and play it with me. Unpunched, unplayed, intact and from what I can tell, complete. Very minimal shelf wear for a game that is 26 years old. Not faded or worn much at all. Payment must be received prior to shipping. Shipping will be via FedEx Ground in the U.S. To a business address, this typically will be $5-6 or less (I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t charge handling or packaging costs). International shipments will be by any insurable method and will depend on the buyer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s wishes for speed/cost/etc.
All pieces are present with a number of extra copies of starship diagrams. The box has followed me around for 26 years and has the expected (nonextensive) wear and tear. Shipping is $6.

Task Force Games 1979 Deluxe Designer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition, containing: -Over 200 counters (complete and 50% unpunched) -20x24 map -Commander_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Rulebook Volumes 1 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; 2 -Commander_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Ships_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; System Display Sheets Book #1 Contents very good, box fair (good amount of wear but otherwise solid). Buyer pays actual shipping costs from 98118 via USPS Parcel or Prority (your pick). Weight should be about 3-4 lbs.

Minor shelf wear on box. Counters unpunched. All components intact. Comes with the Commander_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Rulebook and Commander_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s SSD Sheets (volume 1) (see separate descriptions on BGG).
After all these years, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s time to admit defeat: another game bought with good intentions, but never played. Let_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s find it a good home! Price includes shipping.

Selling complete Task Force Games Star Fleet Battles Volumes 1-3. Vol. 1 box in very good shape; vol. 2 has split corner; vol. 3 in very good shape. Nothing missing. A bargain. All SSD sheets are unused, plus include many photocopies of SSD sheets. Will charge no more than actual shipping cost. Will ship internationally. Note: A BGG bug may be preventing checkout, but this item is available for sale. If you can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t check out or add to cart, send me a geekmail.

Hope I put the game underneath the right title - quite a lot of Star Fleet Battles editions around.. Boxed edition - Star Fleet Battles - Volume 1 Box shows just a little bit of wear (top and bottom have a few _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;dents_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;). Inside everything there in great condition. Game has never been played, all counters unpunched. Shipping at actual cost dependend on destination, total weight and method of shipment chosen. Usually shipping a single (regular sized) boardgame (surface) costs 12.90€ worldwide and 8.60€ within Europe. Smaller games ship cheaper. Of course multiple games can be combined.
+ Verrater, for aaxiom.
Bookshelf edition only partially punched and in new condition.
reserved for rshipley please pay $15.95 to angelinamagsanay@gmail.com at paypal need address

New unpunched game, ziplock bag lightly discolored Shipping_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;Handling – Priority Mail excl. Insurance: Switzerland: CHF 3.-- Europe: USD 9.-- Others: USD 12.-- We will always combine multiple items to reduce your shipping costs where possible.

Two games in one lot. Task Force Games #4 pocket edition. Also included is a boxed edition (Product #5001, same cover art as the pocket edition). Pocket game book is in nice condition. The box of the other game is rough. The front of the box was pushed in. Shipping charges paid by the buyer. Combined shipping available. Please let me know if you wish for the shipment to be insured.

This lot comes in two Star Fleet boxes. BOX #1 Punched and complete copy of the base game with the Commanders Rulebook. In addition to the above: -- 1 set of counters from Module J (two sheets, unpunched) -- 1 set of counters from Module R2 (two sheets, unpunched) -- 1 set of counters from Module R4 (two sheets, unpunched) -- 2 sets of counters from Module R5 (two sheets, only the Hydrans were punched) -- 1 set of counters labeled _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Tournament_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; (one sheet, unpunched) -- 2 set of counters labeled _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Ammunition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; (two sheets, only the Klingons are punched) [It is assumed that all punched counters above are in Box #2] BOX #2: Nearly full with punched and bagged counters. I have no idea what sets they would be for.

Star Fleet Battles a. Designer: Stephen V Cole b. Publisher: Amarillo Design Bureau, Inc. / Task Force Games c. Good condition: Box sags a bit from storage. With fraying at top right corner. Includes rules of play, movement/battle charts and tables, map, counters (unpunched), and six-sided die. Luftwaffe a. Designer: Lou Zocchi b. Publisher: Avalon Hill c. Bookcase Box – Minor wear on exterior sleeve (no warping). Great condition of the interior box and all of the components! Includes mapboard, campaign briefing, target sheets, order of battle cards, rule book, counters (partially unpunched, plastic tray, and six-sided die. This sale is for Dave Schleicher only. +$17.45 for shipping.
Unpunched. Buyer pays shipping from 48236. I am also selling Expansion #1 -- contact me for pricing for both.

Great Condition My husband was an avid gamer and collected board games. His profile is on BBG, under Kimbo. He took excellent care of all his games and they are all in great condition. He passed away in 2012, and the time has come for me to start selling games. Please keep in mind that not all games on his list are for sale, but feel free to ask me about any of them. Thank you Buyer pays shipping/handling
